languages.text: "Удивительно, как одна никчемная песчинка, вымытая потоком, обрушила гору. И-и.. после этого твоего взгляда многомудрой Джай, пожалуй, стоит умолкнуть".
"It is amazing how one worthless grain of sand, washed up by the current, has brought down a mountain. And... after the look you just gave me, I'll keep the rest of my pearls of wisdom to myself."
languages.original_text: "Удивительно, как одна никчемная песчинка, вымытая потоком, обрушила гору. И-и.. после этого твоего взгляда многомудрой Джай, пожалуй, стоит умолкнуть".

traits.locale_text: "It is amazing how one worthless grain of sand, washed up by the current, has brought down a mountain. And... after that look you just gave me, I'll keep the rest of my pearls of wisdom to myself."
"It is amazing how one worthless grain of sand, washed up by the current, has brought down a mountain. And... after that look you just gave me, I'll keep the rest of my pearls of wisdom to myself."

"It is amazing how one worthless grain of sand, washed up by the current, has brought down a mountain. And... after that look you just gave me, I'll keep the rest of my pearls of wisdom to myself."

languages.text: “多么神奇啊，一粒毫无价值的沙子被水流冲了上来，却摧垮了一整座山，而且……既然你用那样的眼神看了我一眼，那我接下来的智慧箴言，还是留给我自己吧。”
languages.original_text: "It is amazing how one worthless grain of sand, washed up by the current, has brought down a mountain. And... after the look you just gave me, I'll keep the rest of my pearls of wisdom to myself."

traits.locale_text: “多么神奇啊，一粒毫无价值的沙子被水流冲了上来，却摧垮了一整座山，而且……既然你用那样的眼神看了我一眼，那我接下来的智慧箴言，还是留给我自己吧。”
“多么神奇啊，一粒毫无价值的沙子被水流冲了上来，却摧垮了一整座山，而且……既然你用那样的眼神看了我一眼，那我接下来的智慧箴言，还是留给我自己吧。”

languages.text: « N'est-ce pas fascinant qu'un simple grain de sable rejeté par le courant ait pu abattre toute une montagne ? Et... vu votre regard, je vais garder mes trésors de sagesse pour moi. »
languages.original_text: "It is amazing how one worthless grain of sand, washed up by the current, has brought down a mountain. And... after the look you just gave me, I'll keep the rest of my pearls of wisdom to myself."

traits.locale_text: « N'est-ce pas fascinant qu'un simple grain de sable rejeté par le courant ait pu abattre toute une montagne ? Et... vu votre regard, je vais garder mes trésors de sagesse pour moi. »

languages.text: «Es increíble que un granito de arena insignificante, arrastrado por la corriente, haya derribado una montaña... aunque viendo cómo me miras, mejor me callo el resto de lo que estoy pensando».
languages.original_text: "It is amazing how one worthless grain of sand, washed up by the current, has brought down a mountain. And... after the look you just gave me, I'll keep the rest of my pearls of wisdom to myself."

traits.locale_text: «Es increíble que un granito de arena insignificante, arrastrado por la corriente, haya derribado una montaña... aunque viendo cómo me miras, mejor me callo el resto de lo que estoy pensando».

languages.text: 「海流に洗われた一粒の価値のない砂が、山を崩すとは驚きね。そんで…アンタのその表情を見た今、残りの真珠のような知恵を自分の胸にしまっておくわ」
languages.original_text: "It is amazing how one worthless grain of sand, washed up by the current, has brought down a mountain. And... after the look you just gave me, I'll keep the rest of my pearls of wisdom to myself."

traits.locale_text: 「海流に洗われた一粒の価値のない砂が、山を崩すとは驚きね。そんで…アンタのその表情を見た今、残りの真珠のような知恵を自分の胸にしまっておくわ」
「海流に洗われた一粒の価値のない砂が、山を崩すとは驚きね。そんで…アンタのその表情を見た今、残りの真珠のような知恵を自分の胸にしまっておくわ」

languages.text: "Es ist erstaunlich, wie ein wertloses Sandkorn, das von der Brandung angespült wurde, einen Berg zum Einsturz gebracht hat. Und ... so, wie Ihr mich gerade angesehen habt, behalte ich meine Weisheiten in Zukunft wohl lieber für mich."
languages.original_text: "It is amazing how one worthless grain of sand, washed up by the current, has brought down a mountain. And... after the look you just gave me, I'll keep the rest of my pearls of wisdom to myself."

languages.original_text: "It is amazing how one worthless grain of sand, washed up by the current, has brought down a mountain. And... after that look you just gave me, I'll keep the rest of my pearls of wisdom to myself."

languages.text: "Akıntıyla sürüklenmiş, değersiz bir kum zerresinin koca dağı yerle bir etmiş olması inanılmaz. Ayrıca... Bana attığın o bakıştan sonra değerli yorumlarımı kendime saklamaya karar verdim."
